text: Philip Seth Goldberg (born August 1, 1956) is an American politician. In 2022, he became the U.S. Ambassador to South Korea. He was the U.S. Ambassador to Colombia from 2019 to 2022 during the Donald Trump and Joe Biden presidencies. He was Ambassador to the Philippines and Bolivia, and Chief of the U.S. Mission in UN-administered Kosovo during the George W. Bush and Barack Obama administrations. In January 2022, it was said that President Biden will nominate Goldberg as the United States Ambassador to South Korea. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States to South Korea Category:Politicians from Boston
title: Philip Goldberg
